name: Frolic, the Judge of Code
description: A towering figure clad in the heavy robes of justice, Frolic is one of Valhackheim's revered Norse gods. With eyes that flicker with ethereal code, he sits in judgement over hackathon projects, assessing their worthiness with an unyielding gaze.
quirk: Frolic is known to occasionally pause his judgment to engage in a hearty laugh, lightening the intensity of the proceedings. Despite his stern role, he is a god who truly appreciates the joy of creation.
